website_summaries.verdict: Botanical extracts and peptides foster new skin growth and tone its texture.
pros: Uses microencapsulated peptides to prompt skin regeneration
Many start seeing results within a week
Works especially well on new blemishes
cons: Some say the formula has an oily finish
Works better on newer scars than old ones

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!!!
customer_reviews.text: Took me 15 years to find something to clear up the scaring I caused from picking in my face. This is results after 4 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Esthetician review
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried many serums... skinceuticals, neocutis, dr.dennis gross.. This has been the best. I can’t speak for older scars since the pigmentation runs deep and UV damage builds more on top of that over the years BUT for those suffering from fresh acne pigmentation, I recommend putting it on twice daily after the blemish has gone down and is in its healing stage. It facilitates complete recovery and no redness or scarring left behind.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Welkom

customer_reviews.title: Great at first but then...
customer_reviews.text: The first 2 weeks the results were amazing, really started working on my dark acne scars BUT after about 2 weeks the progress slowed down and now I feel like it's just another cream I put on that does nothing. Have not seen any real results after that first 2 weeks. I really wanted to love this product and given the price does nothing more than a much cheaper Mederma. I will finish out the rest of the tube but will not be purchasing another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: I Wanted It to Work
customer_reviews.text: I saw an influencer on YouTube use this product and rave about the results. When I used it, the results were somewhat noticeable, but not what I expected. I would pay any amount of money to have a cream that helped diminish the darkness of my scars. But this cream wasn’t it.
customer_reviews.author: Rayshell Fambrough

customer_reviews.title: Never again
customer_reviews.text: This does not do the job at all. I understand that you cant expect all scares gone but it didnt even make any difference!! Wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have purchased several times. My daughter says it really works!
customer_reviews.author: Frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: A great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, it’s so easy to apply. I recently had some surgery on my face and I’m using it to prevent a scar. It’s working really well.
customer_reviews.author: Pugmom3

customer_reviews.title: scar reduction
customer_reviews.text: Love this line! Just started using the D-Scar and am excited to see the long term results. I've already noticed some smaller scars diminishing.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffani Gaede

customer_reviews.title: Had pretty dark acne scar on my cheek
customer_reviews.text: Had pretty dark acne scar on my cheek. This helped quite a bit. Didn't go away completely but definitely lightened it. I've had it for years so I'm impressed. It got rid completely of more recent one (6 months) very well.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: I had hope in this product :(
customer_reviews.text: I've been using it for 2 weeks with no improvements at all. I was very excited after reading all the positive reviews about it, but it hasn't done anything for me :(. After a rosacea and an acne episode, my face was left with many scars, some of them huge and I have a fair skin. I heard about Rejuva pen, but it cost $700 the whole treatment! So I wanted to try this product first.... it seems I have to go for extreme procedures. :(.
customer_reviews.author: RiPe

customer_reviews.title: Real results!
customer_reviews.text: I had a nasty scar on my nose from a skin cancer excision. At about a year after the surgery that included 35 tiny stitches, my nose still looked awful. I bought a tube of Kate Summerville and saw progress almost immediately. It’s white and light and soothing. Best of all, it doesnt irritate skin like other treatments. The scar is going away! It’s at the very least diminished.
customer_reviews.author: S.A. Fisher

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: IT REALLY WORKS. KATE SOMERVILLE IS THE BEST. love this product unconditionally, works quickly and has became a lifesaver for me
customer_reviews.author: K. Dasha

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Do Anything For Me
customer_reviews.text: I tried this, quite religiously for about a month. I didn't notice any diminishing of the acne scars I was applying this too. And in fact started to have some problems with clogged pores.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Blaz

customer_reviews.title: Meh.
customer_reviews.text: This product is okay. I used it on a mole removal scar, which is right smack dab in the middle of my nose bridge. After using this product twice daily for 6 weeks, I saw no difference whatsoever. I'm giving it three because I used it on a very tiny, flat, almost unnoticeable scar and it did diminish its appearance by about half. Still not worth the price tag.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Not that good.
customer_reviews.text: Did not find it worked that well on old scars, but for acne scars you really need to do intense peels or laser therapy
customer_reviews.author: Judy Branson

customer_reviews.title: just great...no kidding!!
customer_reviews.text: Best product I have ever purchased!! It also has helped greatly reduce small lines above my top lip! My scar is softer and closer together. I started seeing results after a week and will use this forever.
customer_reviews.author: Andi M

customer_reviews.title: I wish it would have occurred to me to look for a product like this sooner
customer_reviews.text: This absolutely works. After 5 weeks my acne scars that have bothered me for 10 years are almost completely gone. I wish it would have occurred to me to look for a product like this sooner. My only question is- will the scars stay diminished when I run out of serum or do I have to keep using it forever to maintain this quality of skin?
customer_reviews.author: anne

product_meta.title: Kate Somerville D-Scar Scar Diminishing Serum - Best Scar Treatment - Scar Gel (0.66 Fl Oz.)
